1.0.name: wordpress/events-handler
1.0.description:
Event Handler adds event management that integrates well with your WordPress site. Events Handler integrates with Google Maps; thanks to geocoding, Events Handler can find the location of your event and accordingly display a map. Events Handler also integrates payments for events using paypal.

Features

  • Easy-to-use event interface
  • Easily manage events
  • Upcoming Events Widget
  • Compatibility with Twenty Eleven and Twenty Ten Themes (month and list view)
  • Extensive template tags for customization
  • Google Maps Integration
  • Calendar Month view with tooltips
  • Includes support for venue, cost, address, start and end time, google maps link

The Events Handler PRO features

  • Recurring events
  • Save venues & organizers
  • Custom event attributes
  • Advanced events manager
  • Venue view
  • Single day view
  • Ajax calendar
  • Advanced widgets
